title: TL,DR:  Will I get Ranked Rewards? ***Reward Distribution COMPLETED***
body:
> #***UPDATE 11/18:***
* All Rewards for all regions should now be completely distributed!  If you are convinced you have met all of the criteria, but still did not receive rewards make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
) to us in Player Support so we can investigate further!
* There is a known bug in normal queues where your highest division marker will not be displayed.  This will be fixed in the next patch!

--------------------------------------------------------------------

> #***UPDATE 11/16:***
* The overwhelming majority of players should have all received their rewards for all regions (Borders, icons, skins, etc).  
We are still working on identifying edge cases, or finding players we may have missed.  However, all rewards should be distributed by November 18th, 23:59 PST.

-----------------------------------------------------------
> #***UPDATE: 11/11:***
* With the latest patch, we have updated the Border Art in the Loading Screen.  ***This is new art for EVERYONE, and is NOT the 2015 Ranked Reward Border.***  Those will be distributed by November 18th, 23:59 PST.

------------------------------------------------------------------

> #***UPDATE 11/5:*** 
The rules for being kicked from a ***Ranked Team*** and then re-joining has changed.  This is the updated section:
 * If you were kicked from (or left) a team for whatever reason, and then rejoin, your past wins ***WILL remain***.  You do ***NOT*** need to start over in terms of number of wins
   * For example, if you won 8 games, and then were kicked from (or left) the team (then re-invited), you would only need to win 2 more games, because your prior 8 wins are remembered.
   * If you are never re-invited to the team, you will not earn rewards.  You ***NEED*** to be on that team on November 11th, 00:01 PST in order to earn rewards
   * If you join a ***new different team***, you will still need to earn 10 wins on that team



Hey everyone,

Ranked Rewards are the culmination of everyone’s hard work throughout the season (or grinding those 10 ranked games at the last minute XD). We want to make sure everyone knows the exact requirements in order to unlock those rewards:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

> #***Ranked Season***

* Ranked Queues will be disabled on November 11th, 00:01 in each region.  [For NA, this is PST ](http://bit.ly/1H8vM18) -- Click here for [EUW](http://bit.ly/1kha3Pt), [EUNE](http://itsalmo.st/#theendofthe2015rankedlolseason_hs4zz), and [OCE](http://bit.ly/1XFI6iT).)
 * You can queue at any time before this, and the game will still count.  You can even queue at exactly 00:00 PST on November 11th, and the ranked game will ***still*** count. 
 * The Ranked Season will officially end once the final ranked game is completed in that region
 * Challenger/Master tiers will update one final time after the final games are completed (after the Ranked queue is disabled) which determine the end of season standings
* If you decay at exactly 00:00 PST on November 11th, you will get rewards based on where you land after the decay. Decay is disabled on November 11th, 00:01 PST --  the same time Ranked Queues are disabled
* You can find a full list of rewards for each Tier [in this Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/205891456-2015-Season-Rewards#h1)
* Rewards are displayed for specific queues.  A full explanation [can be found here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/205891456-2015-Season-Rewards#h3q5)

> #***Ranked Solo-queue***

* Can be completed solo or with a duo-queue partner
* To earn rewards, you must have played ***ALL*** 10 games (ie, your placement games)
 * Unlike Ranked Teams, you do not need to win 10 games
* Rewards are awarded depending on your ending rank at November 11th, 00:01 PST, ***NOT*** your highest achieved
* You must be Silver Tier and above to receive a Loading Screen border
* You must be Gold Tier and above to receive the Victorious Sivir Skin (If you don't own Sivir, she will be added to your account.)  
 * ***NOTE:*** If you purchased Sivir right before receiving Victorious Rewards, she will ***not*** be refunded.

> #***Ranked Teams***

* A ranked team must have completed 5 ranked games by November 11th, 00:01 PST
* You must have ***WON*** 10 games in a single ranked team to qualify for team rewards
 * You must have 10 wins on the same team, not on multiple teams
 * If you won 10 ranked games on a team, and then are kicked from that team, you will ***not*** earn rewards.  Player Support cannot override or change this.
   * If you are never re-invited to the team, you will not earn rewards.  You ***NEED*** to be on that team on November 11th, 00:01 PST in order to earn rewards
 * If you were kicked from (or left) a team for whatever reason, and then rejoin, your past wins ***WILL remain***.  You do ***NOT*** need to start over in terms of number of wins
   * For example, if you won 8 games, and then were kicked from (or left) the team (then re-invited), you would only need to win 2 more games, because your prior 8 wins are remembered.
   * If you join a ***new different team***, you will still need to earn 10 wins on that team
 * If your team goes into an in-active state before November 11th, 00:01 PST, your team will ***not*** earn rewards
* The Ranked Team Ward Skin is unlocked for each individual (not team) based on how many points you individually earned during the Ranked Season:
 * You must ***WIN*** Ranked Team games to earn points -- Points are individually earned, not tied to specific teams
   * Victory in Ranked Team 3v3 - 1 point
   * Victory in Ranked Team 5v5 - 3 points
   * Points are earned from ***ALL*** Ranked Teams combined.  Points do not have to be earned within a single Ranked Team.  Even if you leave the team, are kicked, or if the team disbands, your points remain.
 * Ward Skin tiers are unlocked at 20, 45 and 75 points respectively
   * You must earn 20 points to earn the base Ward Skin

> #***Things that will get your ass disqualified from Ranked Rewards***

* Being banned or having ***active*** chat/ranked restrictions at November 11th, 00:01 PST
* If you had any 7 day or more bans, they ***must*** have expired/ended at or before August 9th, 23:59 PST
 * For example, if you received a 7 day ban on August 2nd and it ended on or sometime before August 9th, 23:59 PDT, you are eligible for rewards
 * On the other hand, if you received a 7 day ban on August 3rd and it ended on or after August 10th, 00:00 PST, you are ineligible for rewards
* Players banned for boosting during the 2015 season remain ineligible for rewards
 * Both those who boosted and those who did the boosting are ineligible
* Players who received fraud-related (including Chargeback bans) and accidental/false bans will still be eligible
* Players who had LeaverBuster suspensions are still eligible
* Being ineligible for 2015 Ranked Rewards does not automatically disqualify you from getting other rewards in future seasons

> #***Reward Distribution***

* All rewards (Borders, banners, icons, Skin Wards, Victorious Sivir/Champion) should be distributed by November 18th, 23:59 PST
 * Rewards are distributed in waves.  If you see others with rewards, but you haven't been rewarded yet, ***don't panic!*** You will get your rewards in subsequent waves
* If you want your reward border to be removed from your account for whatever reason, [contact Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we will get this taken care of for you.
* If you earned rewards, but did not receive them by November 18th, 23:59 PST, feel free to [submit a ticket to Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate further!

replies.body:
"Things that will get your ass disqualified from Ranked Rewards"

I love how this was said. {{champion:222}}

I JUST WANTED TO BE ACCEPTED!
If I reach gold but, only in a team queue do I still get the Victorius Sivir Skin?
If your team is Gold AND you have won 10 games on that team, you get the Victorious Sivir Skin

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6pbIXEEx,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-11-04T22:32:40.737+0000)
>
> * Being banned or have ***active*** chat/ranked restrictions at November 11th, 00:01 PST
> * Had a 7 or more day suspension active within the past three months prior to the end of the season (**August 10th)**
>  * For example, if you received a 7 day ban on **August 2nd** and it ended on or sometime before** August 9th,** 23:59 PDT, you are eligible for rewards
>  * On the other hand, if you received a 7 day ban on **August 3rd** and it ended on or after** August 10th, 00:00 PST**, you are in-eligible for rewards

Not meaning to hate or anything but August does not seem to be the correct month to use.
Do you mean that August 10th is not 3 months past?  Or that 3 months should not be the number?

To be honest, I myself won't receive the rewards because i got myself a ban that only ended on September 1st, however, even thinking this is awesome, makes people have some kind of fear of being a flamer, being punished by a second time (being the first time the ban itself) makes me kinda sad because i worked hard all the season to get where i got, and i dont even care about the skin, but at least i'd want to get the border because it shows where i achieved, and other thing i find kinda bad is the fact that these changes SHOULD ONLY BE ENABLED NEXT SEASON. I got the statement by Lyte that banned players wouldn't have the rewards in the end of my ban, what is kinda bad because changes like this shoudn't be announced in the near-end of season, so i was like, really? Being main Adc, i'd give the morgana one i got last season for the Sivir one, getting banned got me demotivated to keep going as the new policy is: Get punished for talking bad in a game where people can mute you and right after get punished again. People have bad times, i had bad times and never was a flamer, due to personal happenings i kinda found lol a way of escaping the world and sometimes got in with the rage of the real world some months ago, and really got myself as Bad Luck Brian as the time i get raging and flamer, people announce that this happens.   Of course this is my point of view and nothing i say will change a bit, however for future stuff like this, don't go the same way.

Don't be an ass and you won't be banned. Been playing since s2, I've had bad games and flamed people, but have never even received a warning. If you got banned for toxicity, it's all your fault and you deserve it. I don't care if you were going through rough times, it doesn't make your actions justified.

I never got any chat restrictictions and after one salty game with no hate speech/insults/racism or anything really because of someone who was raging and i answered to him and i got a 14 day ban do you think that is fair ?
I think you're a liar.
I do too.

This is so true. I was banned and it ended I think on the 12th of August (my luck). Then I had to play through my ranked restriction and chat ban, and THEN I was told that I couldn't get rewards. It felt like I was getting punished over and over for the same thing. It is complete garbage to implement a rule like that 75% of the way through the season. It's like adding a rule in a game of football 3/4 of the way through the game. If they would have said this is what we are doing next season then I would have literally no problem with it. Being punished after the fact is a psychological principle that is considered horrible and unfair. Timing is everything. What we have here is just plain and simple unfair. Unnecessarily so.

I agree with "O Grandíssimo Zé " on this one. I was given out my ban on August 9th, and that was a huge wake up call. 
I have improved myself drastically and feel that I have prevented more toxicity than caused it. However, I am now being "punished" again by a rather spontaneous rule that you will not receive rewards if you were banned that should have been placed at the beginning of the season rather than 2 months before it ends, that really isn't fair considering the amount of dedication time, and even money that a lot of people put in the game because they truly enjoy just because they had some bad days and got frustrated with the game either because of bad luck or trolls (which you must admit were getting away scott free at the time and had a less punishment percentage than toxic players). 

The number should be whenever Lyte announced the criteria of the ranked season rewards. I believe he did it some time in September so it should really only be 2 months at most. Truthfully, I would not have gone as far as I did to get banned if I had known that my ranked season rewards were in jeopardy. Part of the reason that I want to rank up is because I want to show others that I am capable of, but now that is all taken away from me because I messed up in 10 games of my 700+ this season that led to my ban.

It really doesn't matter how bad of a day you had, or what happened in a game, or the situation you were in; if you were a toxic dick, you deserved whatever was coming to you. You really can't sit there and act like it's not fair that you won't receive rewards meant for those who climbed that ladder following the Summoner's Code. You were a toxic dick, you don't deserve rewards; pretty damn simple. I'm honestly really glad Riot placed this rule at the end of the season, because it directly punishes actions no matter when they happened, which serves as a reminder for those who are no longer under the effects of the punishment, of how serious it is to receive a ban or restriction. My motto is, toxic dicks shouldn't be playing League.
I find it funny that in your attempt to explain why he shouldn't get rewards, you were a toxic dick. That is hilarious.
There was a tough time in my life where league was my only escape, and then I brought my tough times with me,  the last time I was banned was February. Thanks for changing me Rito :)

Oop my bad, I didn't see the three months prior part and I thought that August had been meant to be November, I have misspoken, apologies.

Though I did get a red response though, so worth.

I think it's absolutely hilarious....

One of my friends has been banned 6 times in the course of the year, but hasn't played since July, so still gets rewards.

On the other hand my other friend was banned for the first time in August  loses rewards, haha! 

Terrible show of fairness. Imagine if a similar rule was applied to acts in society. "it's ok if you murder someone before August, but if you murder during the month of august, you will get put in jail". 

Either, don't give rewards to anyone who was banned through the WHOLE season. Or give everyone rewards that does not have an active ban within the last month. 3 months is extreme, especially when you should notify everyone in client of the impending change to rewards. 

If they haven't been banned again, clearly they have reformed. Things like this, is one reason why i've pretty much stopped playing the game. I've played with some disgustingly toxic players, and i bet a lot of them are still getting rewards.
will we still get random skin box for Not getting any bans/chat bans/etc in the end of the season?

Something like that would be completely separate from Ranked Rewards.

In other words, I have no idea!  Keep an eye out on future announcements though!

I recently joined a gold twisted tree line team and was wondering if I'm eligible for the reward (victorious sivir) my team has met all the requirements for it I was wondering if I receive it considering I have not played a single game on the ranked team

Per the explanation for teams, you need to have WON ten games on that team to get the team rewards.

So if you haven't played a single game as of yet, you won't get rewards.
Reward Distribution ON-GOING? (Yet to see anyone on NA with any rewards) Thumps up Riot. You guys are the best (cough)
Same 48 hours and Ive seen no rewards on anyone. They should release batches/waves according to rank starting will Challenger since it will take the least amount of time to get the info they need.
Just waiting for rewards meh

It would be a great idea to make it so that whoever got banned after august 9th is disqualified rather than players with a ban duration over august 9th for better cooperation with our players. {{champion:36}}

I agree with this.

It kind of sucks that they start your re rehabilitation period after your sentence rather than while your serving it. I'm going to miss it by like 3 days lol.
So do you not get a border and the victorious skin if you get to gold with a team?
You definitely do!  Remember, that while the team has qualified for those rewards, you need to have WON 10 games on that team for you personally to earn those rewards.
